markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Rat](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=462)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 288 <sup>1.1</sup>

Rats are a ubiquitous menace, scurrying through the sewers and on the streets of nearly every settlement in the world. Though a regular rat darting underfoot might startle or even frighten the average passerby, giant rats and rat swarms are far more dangerous.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Giant Rat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3162) (Creature -1), [Rat Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3163) (Creature 1)
name: Rat
